Help:
1) Gladiators does not work for me (the graphics are messed up when 
I start playing it). How do I fix it?
- Note: When I was installing it using winrar, it says that there 
were errors on the files.

2) Besides the Yahoo Groups, is there a website for this group?

Suggestions:
1) Is it possible to play Gladiators on Multiplayer?

2) Wouldn't it be fun if someone (or a group of people) made 
Gladiators into an MMORPG? Where you can be one class and keep 
gaining levels / etc by doing various quests and killing monsters. 
You would be able to gain items, gold, weapons/armor, spells, 
techniques, etc.. and be able to play with your friends online!
- Note: I have more ideas XD
- Note: If it becomes an MMORPG, I might be able to help on the 
graphics (monsters, weapons, etc). Maybe the music composition too!
